full_summary:
### Tender Details
#### About the Tender
The National Capital Commission (NCC) invites proposals from qualified consultants to conduct interprovincial truck surveys in the National Capital Region (NCR). The surveys will support the implementation of the Long-Term Integrated Interprovincial Crossings Plan for the NCR.

#### Tender Documents
The tender documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) and all addenda, are available on the [Canadabuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) website.

#### Bid Submission Deadline
Submissions will not be accepted by mail, courier, or fax. Electronic submissions only will be accepted via email at [Bids-soumissions@ncc-ccn.ca](mailto:Bids-soumissions@ncc-ccn.ca), with the subject line "MA066." The bid submission deadline is March 28, 2023, at 3:00 p.m. DST.

#### Evaluation Criteria
The contract will be awarded to the bidder with the highest combined score based on Technical Merit (70%) and Price (30%). To be declared responsive, a bid must meet all technical evaluation criteria, score a minimum of 60% on the technical proposal (42 points maximum), and comply with all requirements of the bid solicitation.

#### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

#### Questions and Clarifications
Inquiries and other communications must be directed only to Micheline Al-Koutsi, Senior Contract Officer, via email at [micheline.al-koutsi@ncc-ccn.ca](mailto:micheline.al-koutsi@ncc-ccn.ca). Enquiries received less than seven (7) calendar days before the bid closing date will not be considered.
